resources.string: The purpose of this section is to provide your GPS coordinates to a service that can plot users on a map, should it ever be neccessary. This can help effectively secure campus in the event of an emergency.
The button below will provide you with your current GPS location.

\n The next button is intended for emergency use. It will send your best approximate GPS location to a remote mapping service in the event emergency services or university officials should need to know your location.
